member_organisations: 28 national regional colleges whose seats coincides with centers of 28 regions of Bulgaria
fields_of_interest: Competition, Education and training, Business and Industry, Public Health
head_office_address: 36 Dragan Tsankov Blvd office B602 - 6th floor
eu_initiatives: All the activities concerning the pharmacist and the products deliver by the pharmacist
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
legal_status: National Official Professional Organisation of pharmacists
goals__remit:
Professional organisation of all regular magister pharmacists in Bulgaria 
Health and Pharmacy Profession 
Register of all practicing pharmacists in Bulgaria 
Drafting of professional rules of conduct and ethics of magister pharmacists 
representation of magister pharmacists profession in front of European Union authorities 
Defense of rights and interests of magister pharmacists on internal and international arena 
Regulation of exercise of pharmacist profession in Bulgaria with mandatory membership in BPhU 
Control and registration of all forms of continuing professional education of magister pharmacists
